message: since jdic is dead, i wonder how people get file associations to work. i tried it on a windows machine with creating a process which starts the REG command line tool with some parameters to get it to work. so, to get this done on linux i have to register a magic number and on mac i don't even have a clue. isn't there a lib for all this out there in the net? or do people have to do this by hand?
